Name: Cool Orchard
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker.
Review: An unusual line up of ingredients combine to make a great drink.
History: Created in 2001 by Douglas Ankrah for Akbar in Soho, London, England
